title: New Captain America: Brave New World Trailer & Poster Released at D23 Brazil
description: During D23 Brazil, a new Captain America: Brave New World trailer was released. It teases the impending showdown between Harrison Ford’s Red Hulk and Anthony Mackie’s Captain America. The Marvel Cinematic Universe movie will be released in United States theaters on February 14, 2025. “After meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, played by […] The post New Captain America: Brave New World Trailer & Poster Released at D23 Brazil appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Tyler Treese
excerpt: A new Captain America: Brave New World trailer was released teasing the impending showdown between Harrison Ford's Red Hulk & Anthony Mackie.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: During D23 Brazil, a new Captain America: Brave New World trailer was released. It teases the impending showdown between Harrison Ford’s Red Hulk and Anthony Mackie’s Captain America. The Marvel Cinematic Universe movie will be released in United States theaters on February 14, 2025. “After meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, played by Harrison Ford in his Marvel Cinematic Universe debut, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red,” reads the film’s official synopsis. Check out the new Captain America: Brave New World trailer below: Who is in the new Captain America: Brave New World trailer? The upcoming Captain America: Brave New World stars Anthony Mackie and Harrison Ford, alongside Danny Ramirez as Joaquin Torres/Falcon, Carl Lumbly as Isaiah Bradley, Liv Tyler as Betty Ross, and Tim Blake Nelson as Samuel Sterns/Leader. Shira Haas, Xosha Roquemore, Giancarlo Esposito, Seth Rollins, and Rosa Salazar also appear in the film. Julius Onah directs the new MCU movie. Onah previously made 2015’s The Girl Is in Trouble, 2018’s The Cloverfield Paradox, and 2019’s Luce. It is produced by Kevin Feige and Nate Moore. Louis D’Esposito and Charles Newirth serve as executive producers. Check out the Captain America: Brave New World poster below:
html:
During D23 Brazil, a new Captain America: Brave New World trailer was released. It teases the impending showdown between Harrison Ford’s Red Hulk and Anthony Mackie’s Captain America. The Marvel Cinematic Universe movie will be released in United States theaters on February 14, 2025.

“After meeting with newly elected U.S. President Thaddeus Ross, played by Harrison Ford in his Marvel Cinematic Universe debut, Sam finds himself in the middle of an international incident. He must discover the reason behind a nefarious global plot before the true mastermind has the entire world seeing red,” reads the film’s official synopsis.

Check out the new Captain America: Brave New World trailer below:

Who is in the new Captain America: Brave New World trailer?

The upcoming Captain America: Brave New World stars Anthony Mackie and Harrison Ford, alongside Danny Ramirez as Joaquin Torres/Falcon, Carl Lumbly as Isaiah Bradley, Liv Tyler as Betty Ross, and Tim Blake Nelson as Samuel Sterns/Leader. Shira Haas, Xosha Roquemore, Giancarlo Esposito, Seth Rollins, and Rosa Salazar also appear in the film.

Julius Onah directs the new MCU movie. Onah previously made 2015’s The Girl Is in Trouble, 2018’s The Cloverfield Paradox, and 2019’s Luce. It is produced by Kevin Feige and Nate Moore. Louis D’Esposito and Charles Newirth serve as executive producers.

Check out the Captain America: Brave New World poster below:
